description:
Chi-chan wants to go on a family vacation to make some summer memories, so Yuka`s mom suggests a trip to a hot spring in return for helping her around the house. They invite Non-chan, and the gang is off to the hot spring!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: What Could This Be? Setting Off on a Family Vacation!
ハテハテ? 家族旅行に出発でち!
